analyzed: svayaṃbhū stavaḥ
translated: Self-Arisen Praise

analyzed: namaḥ te viśvarūpāya jyotīrūpāya te namaḥ
translated: Homage to you, the one with the form of the universe, homage to you, the one with the form of light.

analyzed: namaḥ svayaṃbhave nityam jagat uddhāra hetave
translated: Homage to the self-arisen one, always for the sake of liberating the world.

original: tvaṃ buddhastvaṃ ca dharmo daśabalatanayastvaṃ tathā bodhisattva
analyzed: tvam buddhaḥ tvam ca dharmaḥ daśabala tanayaḥ tvam tathā bodhisattva
translated: You are the Buddha, you are the Dharma, you are the son of the one with ten powers, you are the Bodhisattva,

original: stvaṃ bhikṣuḥ śrāvakastvaṃ kuliśavaradharastvaṃ tathā dharmadhātuḥ /
analyzed: stvam bhikṣuḥ śrāvakaḥ tvam kuliśa vara dharaḥ tvam tathā dharmadhātuḥ
translated: You are the monk, you are the disciple, you are the wielder of the best thunderbolt, you are the Dharma realm.

original: tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ pramathagaṇapatistvaṃ mahendro yamastvaṃ🔽tvaṃ pāśī tvaṃ dhaneśastvamanalapavanau nairṛtastvaṃ maheśaḥ // //
analyzed: tvam brahmā tvam ca viṣṇuḥ pramatha gaṇa patiḥ tvam mahā indraḥ yamaḥ tvam  tvam pāśī tvam dhaneśaḥ tvam anala pavanau nairṛtaḥ tvam maheśaḥ
translated: You are Brahma, you are Vishnu, you are the lord of the Pramathas, you are Indra, you are Yama,🔽You are Varuna, you are Kubera, you are Agni and Vayu, you are Maheshvara.

analyzed: bhūtāḥ pretāḥ ca tiryak tvam amaram aditi mārnavāḥ tvam vayam ca
translated: You are the ghosts, the pretas, the animals, the immortals, the Maruts, the oceans, and us,

analyzed: cāturyoniḥ tvam eva triguṇa vara tanuḥ pañca jñāna eka mūrtiḥ
translated: You are the four types of birth, you have the best body of the three qualities, you are the one form of the five knowledges.

analyzed: varṇāḥ tvam kāla māsāḥ dinam api rajanī pañca bhūtāḥ tvam eva
translated: You are the colors, you are time, the months, the days, and the nights, you are the five elements,

original: annaṃ ratnaṃ ca sarvaṃ matirati mahatī naḥ sadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ // //
analyzed: annam ratnam ca sarvam matiḥ ati mahatī naḥ sadā tvām natāḥ smaḥ  /
translated: You are all the food and jewels, we always have great faith in you, we bow to you.

original: pañcajñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayamatho bodhisattvāṃśca pañca
analyzed: pañca jñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayam atho bodhisattvān ca pañca
translated: With the five knowledges, you create the Buddhas and the Bodhisattvas yourself,

analyzed: bhūtān etān guṇān trīn aja hari giriśān sthāvarān jaṅgamān ca
translated: The elements, these three qualities, Hari, Giriśa, the immovable and the moving,

original: sarveṣāṃ cetasi stho naṭayasi sakalaṃ sarvato rakṣako'si
analyzed: sarveṣām cetasi sthaḥ naṭayasi sakalam sarvatas rakṣakaḥ asi
translated: You are present in the heart of all, you act as the protector of everything,

original: tvaṃ bījaṃ cāṅkurastvaṃ phalamapi viṭapī sarvadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ // //
analyzed: tvam bījam ca aṅkuraḥ tvam phalam api viṭapī sarvadā tvām natāḥ smaḥ
translated: You are the seed, the sprout, the fruit, and the tree - we bow to you always.

original: śreṣṭhaṃ kṣatraṃ tvamasmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvataḥ sarvadevān
analyzed: śreṣṭham kṣatram tvam asmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvatas sarva devān
translated: You are the best of the Kshatriyas, you are the lord of all, you distribute all the gods,

original: grāmāṃstīrthāni deśān nṛpasahitanarān naigamāṃścāpi sarvān /🔽dvīpeṣvanyeṣvapi tvaṃ vibhajasi sakalaṃ jyotiṣāṃ saṃvibhāgam
analyzed: grāmān tīrthāni deśān nṛpa sahita narān naigamān ca api sarvān  dvīpeṣu anyeṣu api tvam vibhajasi sakalam jyotiṣām saṃvibhāgam
translated: The villages, the holy places, the countries, the people along with the kings, and all the merchants,🔽You distribute the light of all the stars in the other continents as well,

analyzed: bījībhūta eka dīpaḥ asi akhilam api jagat vayāpakaḥ tvām natāḥ smaḥ
translated: We bow to you, the sole lamp that has become the seed, and pervades the entire world.

analyzed: jyotiḥ tvadīyam paritas visāri sita aruṇa śyāmaka pīta raktam
translated: Your light spreads all around, white, red, dark, tawny, and red,

original: dṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sarvamidaṃ bhavantaṃ manyāmahe tvāṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam // //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tatas sarvam idam bhavantam manyāmahe tvām praṇatāḥ sma nityam
translated: Having seen that, we consider everything to be you, we bow to you always.

analyzed: nutim mahā rāja kṛtām ye paṭhiṣyanti mānavāḥ
translated: Those men who will recite this praise composed by the great king,

analyzed: cakravarti padam prāpya te hi muktim avāpnuyuḥ
translated: Having attained the state of a universal monarch, they will attain liberation.

analyzed: śrī cāturmahārāja kṛtam svayaṃbhū stavam samāptam
translated: The praise of the self-arisen one composed by the four great kings is completed.
